name: 鄭群星
objective: 射頻辨識系統(Radio Frequency Identificatoin ; RFID )已被列為21世紀所發展的重要科技產業技術項目之一。可取代目前的條碼(Bar-code)資訊辨識系統，整合應用在門禁管理、保全管制、運輸監控、航空行李管控、圖書管理、物流管理及醫療管理等不同的相關領域上。因此本課程在使學生暸解RFID的基本設計原理及整合應用，並培養其實際設計的能力，進而能將之應用於不同的資訊領域上。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Differentiation Features of RFID Systems
Week 3: Fundamental Operating Principles
Week 4: Physical Principles of RFID Systems(ANT Theory)
Week 5: Frequency Ranges and Radio Licensing Regulations
Week 6: Coding and modulation
Week 7:  Data Integrity(Checksum ,CRC,…..Anticollision)
Week 8 : Data Security
Week 9: Standardization
Week 10: The Architecture of Electronic Data Carriers
Week 11: Reader
Week 12: Application
Week 13: RFID射頻辨識系統開發環境介紹
Week 14~17 Final Project
scorePolicy:
10  percent: attendance
30  percent: The midterm exam.
30  percent: The final Project.
22  percent: LAB & Assignments.
 8   percent: A report
materials: Klaus Finkenzeller,RFID Handbook Fundamentals and Applications in Contactless Smart Cards and Identification,Second Edition,Wiley,2003.
